mapper.insert: insert into user (id, account, password, nickname, realname, birth, salary, gender, email, education, address, zodiac, sign_up_time, profile_url, description, is_real) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birth,jdbcType=DATE}, #{salary,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zodiac,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{signUpTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{profileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isReal,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update user set account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birth = #{birth,jdbcType=DATE}, salary = #{salary,jdbcType=BIGINT}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zodiac = #{zodiac,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sign_up_time = #{signUpTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, profile_url = #{profileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_real = #{isReal,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, account, password, nickname, realname, birth, salary, gender, email, education, address, zodiac, sign_up_time, profile_url, description, is_real from user where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, account, password, nickname, realname, birth, salary, gender, email, education, address, zodiac, sign_up_time, profile_url, description, is_real from user
